hadiths.text: It was narrated that Jabir bin' Abdullah said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) bought a load of fodder from a Bedouin man. When the transaction was concluded, the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: 'Choose (either to go ahead or to cancel the transaction).' The Bedouin said: 'May Allah grant you a long life of good transaction

chapter.eng-name: A Transaction With The Option To Cancel
